user_question: How can augmented reality be used to enhance the experience of visiting a historical museum?
final_answer: Augmented reality can enhance the experience of visiting a historical museum by overlaying digital information on exhibits, providing interactive 3D reconstructions of historical events, and offering virtual guides that narrate stories and provide additional context.
